trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hazleton
There were no other sightings in Hazleton on or around November 17th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend were walking home from basketball practice when he notices 4 ligh green ovals spinning in a cirle and we both stopped and suspeced that it was spot lights but we live in a small town so nothing like that would be happing and my friend pointed it out and said that looks like a UFO and we both got in the dark and watched the 4 green ovals slowly spinning. We we both amazed at the sighting and watched for app. 20 min and then contuined on our way home. We will always look after practice to see if we could see this once in a lifetime event. I am very exited to see somthing so intresting me and my friend are staying after school to talk to our science teacher about the UFO sighting. Thank you.
Summary: 4 light green slow ovals spinning clock wise in a circle
